attributes.action: To clarify the laws and statues relating to Social Documentary Photography or any other Photography, rather than criminalise photographers for taking photographs of legitmate Social Documentary for personal use or for the commercial use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Social Documentary Photography has become criminalised or classed has terrorists when taking photographs of Town Centres or other areas. Police have and do demand deletion of photographs or confiscate memory cards or film after taking photographs 'they' feel illegal without any due process.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
